snippet.title: artifacts: Bladee x James Ferraro
snippet.description:
Bladee (@gtbshieldgang)  joins forces with James Ferraro to build “SANCTUARY,” an interactive world where AI characters provoke deep reflection. Step into a shifting labyrinth where mythic archetypes and technology intertwine.

Learn more about the partnership: https://unlocked.microsoft.com/artifacts
Project: https://www.sanctuary-domain.net/info

Subscribe to Microsoft on YouTube here: https://aka.ms/SubscribeToYouTube

Follow us on social:

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/microsoft/ 
 
For more about Microsoft, our technology, and our mission, visit https://aka.ms/microsoftstories
